description: Enies Lobby is a judicial island of the World Government, known as the 'Island of No Night' due to perpetual daylight. It serves as a gateway to Impel Down and Marine Headquarters through the Gates of Justice. The island is heavily fortified with Marine forces and serves as CP9's base of operations.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs. Blueno Begins
keyEvents.description: Luffy confronts CP9 agent Blueno at Enies Lobby, demanding Robin's return and beginning their battle.
keyEvents.significance: One of the major battles of the Enies Lobby assault.

keyEvents.title: Sodom Collapses
keyEvents.description: The King Bull Sodom takes severe cannon damage and collapses at Enies Lobby.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the dangerous opposition the alliance faces.

keyEvents.title: Deception at Enies Lobby Revealed
keyEvents.description: The flashback reveals that Oimo and Kashii were deceived into serving as gatekeepers at Enies Lobby for 50 years.
keyEvents.significance: Exposes the World Government's manipulative tactics.

description: Little Garden is a prehistoric island in Paradise where time seems to have stopped. The island is inhabited by dinosaurs and other ancient creatures. It is where the giants Dorry and Brogy have been fighting their century-long duel.

keyEvents.title: Flashback to Giant Warrior Pirates' Disbandment
keyEvents.description: Flashback shows Little Garden as the location where Dorry and Brogy's duel began, causing the Giant Warrior Pirates to disband.
keyEvents.significance: Connects the Little Garden arc to the current Enies Lobby arc through Oimo and Kashii's backstory.

keyEvents.title: Truth About Dorry and Brogy Revealed
keyEvents.description: Sogeking reveals that Dorry and Brogy are still on Little Garden fighting their duel, not imprisoned by the World Government.
keyEvents.significance: The truth about Little Garden becomes the key to turning Oimo and Kashii into allies.
